name: Unearthed (gibchild)
description:
You came down to this abandoned mine to do one thing: fix some old pipes. But as you trek deeper through the dusty tunnels, you discover the horror of what the original miners unearthed so many years ago.

f e a t u r e s
  • e x p l o r e  a labyrinth of old, spine-chilling mining tunnels while you search for the broken pipes
  • e x p e r i e n c e  the dread of never knowing what might be around the next corner
  • s t r a t e g i c a l l y  drop glow sticks to avoid getting lost in the petrifying darkness
f o r   b e s t   e x p e r i e n c e

In order to get the best performance out of this game, ensure your computer has:

  • Windows 10 (version 1909.1350 or newer)
  • DirectX 12 support
  • An Nvidia Maxwell-generation GPU or newer OR an AMD GCN-generation GPU or newer
  • The latest graphics drivers installed for your GPU

Built in Unreal Engine 5.
